group_1.textLeft: Here's my room. Come in, come in!

group_1.textRight: Sorry for the bother.
Well then... @Let's get started right now!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! @Kokoro-sensei, thank you for the help!

group_1.narration: Speaking of classic winter presents...@a hand-knit scarf!
I want to deliver a scarf,@and my feelings to Hayato!
...Or so I say.@I've always wanted to try knitting,@but I don't really understand it.

group_1.textCenter: A hand-knit scarf?@I could teach you if you like?

group_1.narration: Kokoro is going to teach me!

group_1.textRight: Why don't you try knitting one for yourself first?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! @I don't think I'll be able to do it well the first time...

group_1.textRight: Yeah... It's not realistic to expect your first one to @be perfect...
So, first...@let's start with how to hold your knitting needles.

group_1.textLeft: Yes!
H-how is this?

group_1.textRight: Yeah!@This looks good so far.
The rest is basically just repetition.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yay!@I'll try to keep this up!

group_1.textRight: If you have any questions,@just ask me anytime, okay?

group_1.narration: After Kokoro left,@I continued to knit like crazy...

group_1.textCenter: It seems long enough...@and the stitches look even...
Once Kokoro teaches me how to bind off the @stitches, my first scarf will be complete!
And then...@it's on to making the scarf to give to Hayato...

group_1.textLeft: Here's your Christmas present, Hayato!@Go ahead and open it!

group_1.textRight: For me?@Thank you, Aimi.
This is...@a hand-knit scarf?

group_1.textLeft: I made it just for you, Hayato.

group_1.textRight: Aimi made it just for me...@Amazing... I'm falling in love.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?@Falling in love...?

group_1.textRight: Ah... Damn it...!@I reflexively said that out loud...
Sorry. I'll say it properly.
I am... Aimi is the...

group_1.textCenter: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Nnhuhu,@I have to do my best for Hayato!

group_1.textLeft: L-like this...?

group_1.textRight: Right, right...@And then, we weave in the ends...

group_1.textLeft: Th-then it's finished!@All thanks to Kokoro.

group_1.textRight: Not at all. It's because of all your hard work.
...You know, actually,@I had some leftover yarn in the same color.
I tried knitting a new hat pattern, but I don't need another hat, so if you'd like it...?

group_1.textLeft: Wow! It's so cute!@[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]Can I have this?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I like knitting, but I'm always wondering what @to do with my finished projects...

group_1.textLeft: ...Then I'll gladly take it!@Thank you for the cute hat!

group_1.textRight: I'm happy you like it.

group_1.textLeft: Ah! Wait a minute, maybe this matches the clothes @I bought before!
Ta-daa!@How's it look?

group_1.textRight: Wow! It suits you perfectly!@It's really cute.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302350:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ehehe.
If I wear this when I give my present to Hayato...
...Huhu... huhuhu...

group_1.textRight: [chara:301601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]--?!
A-Aimi! Stop!@Come back...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302350:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Haa...!@S-sorry...
A-anyway! Next, I'll knit one for Hayato!

group_1.textRight: Right!

group_1.narration: After that...@I also knitted a scarf to give to Hayato...

group_1.textRight: H-Hayato...

group_1.textLeft: Huh, Aimi?@What a coincidence to find you here!

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah...@You see... Um...
To-today sure is cold, isn't it!

group_1.narration: Saying this over and over,@I failed to hand it to him.@I stayed in my room until spring...
